name: App Factory Design System
description: Design system pour génération d'applications d'analyse professionnelles

appStructure.description: Chaque app générée doit avoir une structure complète avec sidebar et navigation
components: Sidebar avec navigation contextuelle (Overview, Analytics, etc.)

sidebar.container: { width: '240px', minHeight: '100vh', background: '#16161A', borderRight: '1px solid #2E2E36', padding: '16px', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' }
sidebar.sectionLabel: { fontSize: '10px', fontWeight: '600', textTransform: 'uppercase', letterSpacing: '0.05em', color: '#52525B', padding: '8px 12px' }
sidebar.navItem: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '10px', padding: '10px 12px', borderRadius: '8px', fontSize: '14px', color: '#A1A1AA', cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'all 0.2s ease' }

header.container: { height: '56px', background: 'rgba(15, 15, 18, 0.8)', backdropFilter: 'blur(16px)', borderBottom: '1px solid #2E2E36', padding: '0 24px', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-between' }
header.title: { fontSize: '16px', fontWeight: '600', color: '#FFFFFF' }

kpiCard.container: { background: '#16161A', borderRadius: '16px', padding: '20px', border: '1px solid #2E2E36', transition: 'all 0.2s ease' }
kpiCard.label: { fontSize: '10px', fontWeight: '600', textTransform: 'uppercase', letterSpacing: '0.05em', color: '#71717A' }

card.container: { background: '#16161A', borderRadius: '16px', padding: '24px', border: '1px solid #2E2E36', boxShadow: '0 4px 24px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4)' }
card.title: { fontSize: '14px', fontWeight: '600', color: '#FFFFFF', marginBottom: '16px' }

button.primary: { background: '#00765F', color: 'white', padding: '10px 20px', borderRadius: '8px', border: 'none', fontWeight: '500', fontSize: '14px', cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'all 0.2s ease' }
button.secondary: { background: '#232329', color: '#A1A1AA', padding: '10px 20px', borderRadius: '8px', border: '1px solid #2E2E36', fontWeight: '500', fontSize: '14px', cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'all 0.2s ease' }
button.ghost: { background: 'transparent', color: '#71717A', padding: '8px 12px', borderRadius: '6px', border: 'none', fontSize: '14px', cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'all 0.2s ease' }

input.container: { width: '100%', padding: '12px 16px', background: '#1C1C21', border: '1px solid #2E2E36', borderRadius: '8px', color: '#FFFFFF', fontSize: '14px', outline: 'none', transition: 'all 0.2s ease' }

select.container: { width: '100%', padding: '10px 14px', background: '#1C1C21', border: '1px solid #2E2E36', borderRadius: '8px', color: '#FFFFFF', fontSize: '12px', cursor: 'pointer' }

table.headerCell: { fontSize: '10px', fontWeight: '600', textTransform: 'uppercase', letterSpacing: '0.05em', color: '#71717A', textAlign: 'left' }

badge.default: { display: 'inline-flex', alignItems: 'center', padding: '4px 10px', background: '#232329', borderRadius: '6px', fontSize: '11px', fontWeight: '500', color: '#A1A1AA' }

rules: Toujours inclure une sidebar avec navigation
KPI cards en haut du dashboard (3-5 cards)
Graphiques et visualisations sous les KPIs
Hover states sur tous les éléments interactifs
